modName: Pandora Bloodhunt Vampire Follower CBBE HDT
summary: Add new unique female follower to the game. HDT Required
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=5]Pandora Bloodhunt Follower CBBE HDT[/size]

[/size][size=3]Add a unique female follower to the game.

Default Outfit: Crimson Twilight Armor
